titles.title: To provide for the continuance of oil and gas operations pursuant to certain existing leases in the Wayne National Forest.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

bill.summary: 9/19/1995--Introduced. Provides that a certain election under the Mineral Leasing Act involving the Wayne National Forest, including one made before enactment of this Act, shall be deemed, except in specified circumstances, to be an election to continue operations pursuant to the existing lease, rather than an election to continue the lease as a noncompetitive lease.
